title: The Silver Bird
description: Beneath the rivers of mortality, a race of immortals have lived in secret for centuries, humanity's silent defence against the blood hungry vampires who prey on them. But the age of secrecy is coming to an end, thanks to the vengeful schemes of one vampire...Sebastian, the most powerful immortal in Italy, has not laughed in more than five hundred years. Not since the only woman he ever loved was stolen by the claws of death right in his home of Florence. Now, his only consolation is to hunt the vampire who killed her. And to hold close a curious medallion which holds within its silver heart the makings of a mystery he has never been able to solve.Effie is lost. Cast adrift by her parents' death a year ago, Effie doesn't know what she lives for. When her enigmatic employer offers her a journey to Florence to open an art gallery with him, she jumps at the chance of a new purpose. Florence has always had a special place in her dreams. But Florence is much more than she expected. The streets call to her, whispering in memories she can't quite grasp. And one man, whose face is hauntingly familiar, promises to give her the answers she craves.Will Effie trust him? Or will she forever be haunted by secrets that defy the passing of time?
author: S.J.   Williams
